title: >>> In LIEU of LENNY?
body_text:
It's been a month since weekly regulars have seen the passionately reckless dodger known as Sascha Basista at a dodgeball spectacular. At 17 years young, Basista is confirmed for the main event this coming Saturday night and what a show in store.
VS. Lenny
Lenny has showcased his talents on the biggest stages of dodgeball, dating back to his debut at the massive DODGEBALL XONE in early November 2005. Just the sound of his name turns heads as this "Hot Hands" Catcher award winner has proven time and again that he'll go through anyone to become one of the all-time greats. It's no secret that without Lenny, dodgeball may not be the same.
Will Lenny accept the challenge of one Sascha Basista?
VS.
Rimshot Contest
winner
Just two weeks ago at DODGEBALL 82, Sara DeCuir went on to the big dance winning the 6th
Rimshot Contest
, entering the so-called "Butler Campaign". Though she came up short in her quest to conquer the agile dodger, her contest win earned her bragging rights for life as she became only the third 2-time winner in the sport's history.
In this 7th competition, there is no question the victor will have their hands full. Sascha is one today's hottest commodities and will do whatever it takes to gain the upper hand.
In lieu of Lenny, who will become Sascha's rival captain?
Which match interests you the most?
Mike Edwards vs. Mike Butler
Alison Bertsch vs. Melissa Kerr
Liz Nogueira vs. Kathryn Nogueira
Kevin Adams vs. Grant Cornero
body_html:
It's been a month since weekly regulars have seen the passionately reckless dodger known as Sascha Basista at a dodgeball spectacular. At 17 years young, Basista is confirmed for the main event this coming Saturday night and what a show in store.

VS. Lenny
Lenny has showcased his talents on the biggest stages of dodgeball, dating back to his debut at the massive DODGEBALL XONE in early November 2005. Just the sound of his name turns heads as this "Hot Hands" Catcher award winner has proven time and again that he'll go through anyone to become one of the all-time greats. It's no secret that without Lenny, dodgeball may not be the same.

Will Lenny accept the challenge of one Sascha Basista?

VS. Rimshot Contest winner
Just two weeks ago at DODGEBALL 82, Sara DeCuir went on to the big dance winning the 6th Rimshot Contest, entering the so-called "Butler Campaign". Though she came up short in her quest to conquer the agile dodger, her contest win earned her bragging rights for life as she became only the third 2-time winner in the sport's history.

In this 7th competition, there is no question the victor will have their hands full. Sascha is one today's hottest commodities and will do whatever it takes to gain the upper hand.

In lieu of Lenny, who will become Sascha's rival captain?




Which match interests you the most?
